title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.283 - Reporting period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.283 - Reporting period

State Regulations

The period of time for which an operating statement is
prepared. This period shall consist of the 12 consecutive calendar months or 13
four-week periods that begin on the first day of a month with an additional day
(two in a leap year) added to the last period to make it coincide with the end
of the month. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.283

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
